casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vincent GREGORY. No. 211P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 25, 2015. Vincent Gregory, Bunn, for Gregory, Vincent. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Samuel B. Currin, III, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
